title: Connie Schultz
description: Samantha Bee talks to journalist Connie Schultz about teaching a new generation of journalists, why she used to be called "Connie Tyler Moore," and who cheats more at Scrabble--her or her Senator husband.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
content:encoded: Samantha Bee talks to journalist Connie Schultz about teaching a new generation of journalists, why she used to be called "Connie Tyler Moore," and who cheats more at Scrabble--her or her Senator husband.
